sn14.35:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, pathavidhatum abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn14.35:1.3: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn14.35:1.6: yo vayodhatum abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn14.35:1.7: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn14.35:2.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavidhatum nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn14.35:2.2: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn14.35:2.5: yo vayodhatum nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn14.35:2.6: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami”ti.
